ggshapes 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

ggshapes

The goal of ggshapes is to add more shapes such and stars and other curves to ggplot2 the same way ggforce adds regular polygons and circles.

Installation

You can install the released version of ggshapes from CRAN with:

# Not released yet
install.packages("ggshapes")

And the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("EmilHvitfeldt/ggshapes")

Example

library(ggshapes)
#> Loading required package: ggplot2
ggplot() +
  geom_lissajous(aes(a = 5, b = 4, delta = 2))

data <- data.frame(a = rep(1:4, times = 4),
                   b = rep(1:4, each = 4),
                   delta = 1)

ggplot(data) +
  geom_lissajous(aes(a = a, b = b, delta = delta)) +
  facet_grid(a ~ b)
